scenes.title: Descent into the Veil
scenes.text: You descend the rusted ladder, each rung a reluctant confession to the earth's hidden sins. The air thickens, pregnant with the residue of forsaken trials, where shadows coil like serpents in repose. Your mind whispers doubts—did the experiments here fracture reality's fragile membrane? Objects stir faintly in the gloom, as if breathing secrets. Supernatural darkness presses, a living shroud that hungers for your resolve.
